TEXT.TITLE: QMAX TECHNOLOGY <QMAX.O> SETS NEW STRUCTURE
TEXT.BODY: Qmax Technology Corp said it has reorganized into three operating groups: Pharmaceutical Technology Group, Cosmetic Technology Group and Thermometry Technology Ltd. Reuter
